page.title: 03BLOCK PREFACE (3)
page.content:
Whilst the extention of the M20 motor-way is largely accepted another {social concern}is fast emerging. This is the advent of the{channel tunnel.
What the implications are for the area is not quite clear but already 'battle lines' are being drawn up by the two sides 'for and against' and this has every indication of being a very hotly contested issue.
The two factions are tending to centre round farmers and environmentalists against and local businesses and the unemployed supporting the project.
{ {Last page of Block Preface.
